You are about to set a new password for authentication on the website. Please create a new password and enter it twice in the fields below.
The password must be at least 8 characters long and contain at least 1 digit, 1 uppercase letter, 1 lowercase letter, and 1 special character.

about_us.welcome: Welcome to Allcom, your premier choice for exciting auction sales. At Allcom we specialize in connecting buyers and sellers in a dynamic and transparent marketplace. Our team is passionate about connecting people with unique and valuable items through online auction.
about_us.about_us1: Whether you are a seasoned collector looking for rare artifacts or a seller interested in reaching a global audience, Allcom provides a platform to suit your needs. Our auctions include a variety of categories including art, antiques, jewelry, vintage items and more.
about_us.about_us2: Our company will also soon launch a delivery option, we will immediately inform you about this on the website..
about_us.about_us3: The location of our warehouse is indicated on the map for your convenience. We are located in the city of Berlin at the address Wilhelminenhofstraße 93, 12459.

faq.question_1: How can I participate in the auction?
faq.answer_1: To participate in the auction, you need to register online once. For this, we require your completed 'Participant Application' form. All further necessary documents are to be submitted to our office upon receiving the first purchase.
faq.question_2: Can individuals participate in the auction?
faq.answer_2: Yes, anyone can participate. The auction is open to the public.
faq.answer_3: Yes, inspection is possible by appointment or during the specified times.
faq.question_4: How and when is a won item paid for?
faq.answer_4: The goods must be paid for on the next working day at our pickup location. Payment can be made in cash or by card on-site (no credit cards).
faq.answer_5: The buyer's premium is 20% plus 19% VAT. In total, it is 23.8% on the bid. So, if you bid 100.00 €, you will pay 123.80 €.
faq.answer_6: No, payment must be made at the latest upon pick-up.
faq.question_7: When do I need to pick up the auctioned items?
faq.answer_7: Pick-up times will be provided in the email with the auction invoice. For delayed pick-ups, storage fees ranging from €20.00 - €50.00 per day, depending on the volume of the lot, will be charged.
faq.question_8: How long does the bidding period last?
faq.answer_8: The bidding period duration is indicated by the timer on the item.
faq.question_9: Will I be notified if I win the bid after the auction?
faq.answer_9: The bid is considered accepted when you receive a confirmation message with an invoice via email from the auctioneer.
faq.answer_10: The minimum bid may be announced.
faq.question_11: Is there an automatic bidding system (maximum bid)?
faq.answer_11: Yes, to set up the automatic bidding system for an item, simply enter the maximum amount you are willing to bid for the item. We will incrementally raise your bid on your behalf to keep you as the highest bidder, but only up to your limit.
faq.question_12: Can I return the won item?
faq.question_13: Does the Distance Selling Act apply here?
faq.answer_13: No, this is a public auction with the opportunity for inspection.
faq.question_14: Can I reduce the price due to defects?
faq.answer_14: No, no guarantee is provided for the quality and condition of the items. You have ample opportunity to assess the condition of the item during inspection.
faq.question_15: What does the text under the timer 'Your time differs from the website' mean?
faq.answer_15: The time on your computer, smartphone, etc., may not match the time on the website. Therefore, the displayed timer may deviate from real-time. The company is based in Germany, so German time applies. If the text is displayed despite German time, refreshing the website usually helps.

contact.contact_span: You can contact us anytime, either by phone or email, during our business hours from Monday to Friday from 9:00 to 18:00.
contact.contact_li_1: Cancellation of Bets (Bets cannot be canceled!)
contact.contact_li_2: Activation takes 1-2 days and will not be expedited if you send us a message.

greetings.greetings_h3: Thank you for registering on our auction platform!
greetings.greetings_p_1: After successful verification, your account will be activated and you will be able to use all the features of our auction platform. We are happy to help you if you have any questions. Thank you for your trust in our platform.
